<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
GADM provides up-to-date administrative boundaries,
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`continents`|Continental boundaries|
|`unsd`|Regional disaggregation used by the UNSD|
|`level0`|Country boundaries|
|`level1`|Smooth country boundaries|
|`level2`|Country-specific level 2 boundaries (e.g. regions)|
|`level3`|Country-specific level 3 boundaries (e.g. districts)|
|`level4`|Country-specific level 4 boundaries (e.g. municipalities)|
|`level5`|Country-specific level 5 boundaries (e.g. cities)|
</div>
